channel.title: Posts on David Parker

item.title: learning hugo
item.description: I needed to rebuild my business site for Bike Spoke Studios. In the past I had been using a home-made static site written entirely by myself in HTML, CSS and Javascript. It was a bit clunky, and looked a bit like it was from the 1990’s. I really like the GIF I used as a logo (a model of an old steam engine), but other than that, I knew it needed updating.
